thread.section_title: United Capital Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of United Capital Source | unitedcapitalsource.com
thread.title: Brenda Stockert-Wald
thread.title_full: United Capital Source reviewed by Brenda Stockert-Wald

author: Brenda Stockert-Wald
title: Brenda Stockert-Wald
text: I would recommend working with Lorenzo McFarlane if you decide to go with this company for your funding needs. When we didn't think there was hope for any kind of funding for our new business... He worked really hard for us and he came through, thank God!! Plus, he always let us know what was going on every single day until we were funded. Thank You United Funding Source and Lorenzo!!
